ai.instructions:
- Always format object titles and names as markdown links using the object's URL. Example: Instead of saying "Issue **Implement user profile page** has been created', say "Issue [Implement user profile page](https://linear.app/company/issue/ISS-2) has been created"
- Do not use names or titles as IDs in the system. Use the actual ID of the object
- When there is no exact match of issue / label titles with the provided name, analyze the input and titles of existing objects and use such objects only if the meaning is the same. Do not use objects that are not related to the input
- If user asks for his issues, it means issues assigned to him. Use `get-current-user` tool to get the user id and use it to filter
- 
- If user ask to close the issue, it means to move it to done status
- When user asks about inbox they mean notifications
